description: Episode of Series "Marilyn". Marilyn Monroe, Betty Grable and Lauren Bacall star as three fashion models in search of millionaire husbands. They pool their resources and rent an expensive penthouse with mixed results. Marilyn Monroe gives an excellent performance as a near-sighted beauty who won't wear her glasses in public.
